item.description:
GWP is a hopping, clapping, drawing, bouncing, singing, playing, interacting and learning program for children 0 to 5 and their families. Most importantly, we invest in learning that continues beyond the classroom walls. We grow with our children and our families, and continuously develop our curriculum to create a solid foundation for your child’s life-long learning journey.

Our new session has successfully started! Hooray!

All four groups are full! However, we saved one special spot in each group for new families who want to get a sneak peek of our program. Sign up for a sample class at and share fun with us!

We meet four times a week:

  • Monday at 10am
  • Thursday at 9am
  • Thursday at 11am
  • Saturday at 9:30am

For details go www.meetup.com/GrowingWell.

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Sneak Peek of a New RPG Program "Friendship" (birth to 5)
